name: Deepcord
tagline: Discord analytics for metrics insights and audience research
description: Deepcord: Discord analytics for community builders. Track metrics across 500K+ servers, discover trending communities, monitor competitors, and find your audience. Advanced search, custom watchlists, and leaderboards help you make data-driven growth decisions.

name: Reader Mode 2.0
tagline: Read, highlight and annotate the web without distractions
description: Reader Mode is a distraction-free reader that removes ads & clutter from the web. It includes text-to-speech, dyslexia support, highlighting, annotations, bookmarking & research tools. Available as a browser extension, web app, and mobile & desktop app. âœ¨

name: GraphFast
tagline: The fastest way to create beautiful line graphs
description: Create beautiful line graphs in less than 120 seconds. Turn your research data into stunning visualizations, fast. No signup required. It's free, powerful, and incredibly easy.

name: Text2Note
tagline: Turn any text into actionable notes
description: Turn any text into smart, actionable notes. Perfect for students, researchers, and professionals.

name: Project G-Assist
tagline: On-GPU AI, built for the game
description: Project G-Assist is an AI assistant powered by your GeForce RTX PC that helps you tune and optimize your system.

name: Artify
tagline: Learn art history with us
description: Discover art history with Artify. 5,000+ artists, 200,000+ artworks, all art movements. Learn, explore, and enrich your understanding of arts and culture.

name: TxGemma
tagline: AI models for faster drug development
description: TxGemma is the open model based on Google's Gemma 2, specialized for therapeutics development. Predict molecule properties, analyze data, or chat about results. Available on HF & Vertex AI.

name: Ayo 2.0
tagline: Link-in-bio for gamers, game devs and gaming creators.
description: Ayo is the go-to Bio in Link tool for gamers, game devs, gaming creators and hype lifestyle shops to create a sleek link page. We re the glue that connects your presence online.

name: Teamsaver
tagline: Where team updates turn into happiness
description: A shared space to appreciate your team for their hard work. Recognize achievementsâ€”big or smallâ€”as team members share updates, receive public appreciation, and earn trait-based badges they can carry throughout their careers.

name: ConvertHub
tagline: Online file converter
description: Convert your files with our easy online file converter. No software installs neededâ€”simply upload and get your results in seconds!

name: TrustedBy
tagline: AI Tools Trusted by Top Business Leaders and Operators
description: TrustedBy.ai is a curated AI tool directory for business professionals. We only list AI tools that are trusted by real users â€” marketers, lawyers, consultants, founders, investors, and other experts â€” and often backed by top-tier VCs.

name: GhibliGen
tagline: Transform photos to ghibli style at cost lower than gpt
description: Transform your everyday photos into enchanting Studio Ghibli-style artwork with our AI-powered transformation tool.

name: The QuickPad
tagline: Free online rich text editor
description: The QuickPad is a free online notepad to write rich content, save in your browser without login, and export as PDF, HTML, image, text, or DOCX. Features: create public URLs to share notes, access them on any device, and scan QR codes to open notes easily.

name: Wallpea
tagline: Create the unimaginableâ€”instantly with AI.
description: Wallpea: Your AI-powered creative companion. Generate stunning visuals, from images to logos, with a click. Streamline your workflow, access royalty-free stock images, and edit photos effortlessly. Perfect for businesses, creatives, and marketers

name: themecn
tagline: A real-time theme generator for shadcn/ui.
description: themecn streamlines your design workflow with powerful, intuitive theme creation for shadcn/ui. Experiment with colors, typography, and moreâ€”all with instant visual feedback. No more guesswork.

name: Wowo - Words Come Alive, Play
tagline: Learn new words effortlessly with games, images, and audio
description: Boost your vocabulary effortlessly with Wowo, the interactive word-learning app designed for both kids and adults! With engaging visuals, audio support, and fun games, learning new words has never been this easy and enjoyable. Let's join now

name: sapiens
tagline: A curated collection of unique people across the internet.
description: A curated collection of unique individuals across the internet, giving everyone a chance to be seen, appreciated, and connected.

name: Neurally
tagline: From Knowledge to Conversations
description: Neurally transforms your content into a product-aware AI assistant. Just plug in your data, deploy on your site or WhatsApp in minutes.

name: TalkToSales
tagline: Make your website into a voice-driven tour and presentation
description: TalkToSales puts an AI assistant on your website that talks to users about your offerings, gives them live tours of your website or app, and shows dynamic content as it becomes relevant. It also qualifies visitors as leads and books conversions as appropriate.

name: BrowserAI
tagline: Open source SDK: Run LLMs directly in browser with 3 lines
description: BrowserAI is an open-source JavaScript SDK that lets developers run powerful local LLMs like Llama, DeepSeek-Distill, and Kokoro directly in the browser with minimal code. It eliminates the need for complex backends while providing privacy.
